doc:
Crystal Bernard https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Crystal_Bernard 0 Crystal Lynn Bernard (born September 30, 1961) is an American singer-songwriter and actress, best known for her role on the sitcom Wings. She has appeared in film and has pursued a music career. Crystal_Lynn_Bernard ( born September_30_,_1961 ) is an_American_singer-songwriter_and_actress , best_known for her_role on the_sitcom_Wings . She has_appeared in film and has_pursued a_music_career .
